snippet: A Manhattan federal judge certified a class-action suit led by a Mississippi retirement fund that claims Goldman’s offering documents on an investment were false and misleading.
lead_paragraph: A Manhattan federal judge certified a class-action suit led by a Mississippi retirement fund that claims Goldman’s offering documents on an investment were false and misleading.

headline.main: Class Action Against Goldman Can Proceed, Judge Rules
headline.print_headline: Class Action Against Goldman Can Proceed, Judge Rules

keywords.value: Public Employees' Retirement System of Mississippi
keywords.name: organizations
